import React from 'react' function ADDPRODUCT() { const [values,setvalues]=useState( { DataTransferItemList:"", desc:"", img:"", categories:"", size:"", color:"", price:"", error:"", sucess:false } ) const { error ,sucess}=values; const handlechange=name=>event=>{ setvalues({...values,error:false,[name]:event.target.value}) } return (

ADD PRODUCT

{JSON.stringify(values)}
) } export default ADDPRODUCT
